notes: boots, but gives an error message and won't continue past the first screen.
title: Murderous Pursuits

notes: Crashes at the splash screens when xact is not installed. After installing, the main menu works. Most key bindings are empty in the options menu and cannot be set either. Hangs infinitely in the loading screen when trying to enter the game, though no error appeared in the proton log. Adjusting graphics options had no effect.
title: Murderous Pursuits

notes: First run: black screen, long time loading from the hard disk, then inactivity. Posterior runs: briefly shows an intro screen and then presents a crash dialog.Tried disabling esync, d3d11, and changing to wined3d, no dice.
title: Murderous Pursuits

notes: Needs `winetricks xact` to launch to the menu. With DXVK many models are invisible. Using wined3d11 makes models visible. Performance is pretty bad and mouse movement is weird. The game often randomly crashes.
title: Murderous Pursuits

notes: You need to install xact in the game prefix and set xaudio2_7 as native in winecfg to avoid crash at the start of the game
title: Murderous Pursuits

notes:
Crash after 1st screen, error is : xaudio2_7.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module xaudio2_7.dll at 0023:e6d46eef.
title: Murderous Pursuits
